{{Infobox single | | Name = Walking Far From Home | Type = single | Artist = [[Iron and Wine]] | Cover = | | Released = November 26, 2010 | Genre = [[Alternative music|Alternative]] | Label = [[Warner Bros. Records|Warner Bros.]](US)
[[4AD]] (international)| | }} "'''Walking Far From Home'''" is the first single off of [[Iron & Wine]]'s 2011 album ''[[Kiss Each Other Clean]]''. It was released on November 26, 2010 in the United States by Warner Brothers Records on CD and 12" vinyl.http://www.passingafternoon.com/discography/walkingfar.html It is Iron & Wine's first album on Warner Brothers Records after being on Sub Pop Records for most of their career. It was released in Europe by 4AD as a 7" vinyl on January 17, 2011. ==Track listing== # "Walking Far from Home" 4:47 # "Summer in Savannah" 4:02 # "Biting Your Tail" 3:42 ==References== {{cleanup-link rot|date=August 2011}}{{Reflist}} {{Iron & Wine}} [[Category:2011 singles]] [[Category:Iron & Wine songs]] {{2010s-single-stub}} {{rock-song-stub}}
